author: Matthew Beedham
title: Americans don’t ‘get’ electric vehicles or self-driving tech — but it’s not their fault
description: Many well-known marques like Ford, MINI, BMW, and GMC, have announced or are launching exciting electric vehicles this year — but it seems many Americans still don’t quite understand them. On an index of 100, public confidence in EVs flatlined at 55 points, s…
content:
Many well-known marques like Ford, MINI, BMW, and GMC, have announced or are launching exciting electric vehicles this year but it seems many Americans still dont quite understand them.
